strapiPost.title: Race Through The Woods During the Here’s Johnny 10K Trail Run
strapiPost.content:
Tap into your inner Jack Torrance during the inaugural Here’s Johnny 10k trail run at Coler Mountain Bike Preserve on Saturday, Oct 7.

All Work, No Play: The Here's Johnny 10k will feature technical trails for those looking to take the next step in trail running. Racers will navigate the eerie woods of Coler Mountain Bike Preserve, starting in the misty valley and weaving through parts of the Here’s Johnny trail before returning to The Homestead.

Shining Performance: All racers will receive a special-edition finisher medal and t-shirt. Awards will be given out to the top overall runners as well as the top 3 in each age group. Sign up by Sep 14 to guarantee your t-shirt size.

Race entry is $40. Register to run HERE.
